name: README - Notes for the directory structure in IOT2040
info:
# Criar direct√≥rio onde ser√£o guardados os config files e posteriormente acedidos.

## Estrutura do Direct√≥rio:

---

### project_Data/
### ‚îú‚îÄ sensor_Configs/
### ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ acquired_Data/
### ‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ sensor1_Data.json
### ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ adicional_NotificationSettings/
### ‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ extra_Noti_1.json
### ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ current_Configs/
### ‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ config1_Current.json
### ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ rs232_Configs/

### ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ voltage_Configs/
### ‚îÇ  ‚îÇ  ‚îú‚îÄ config1_Voltage.json
###
